member.name: GdiplusStartupInput.GdiplusStartupInput

summary.para: The constructor sets the GdiplusVersion member to 1. All of the constructor parameters are optional, so you can declare a variable of type GdiplusStartupInput without passing any arguments to the constructor, and all of the members will be initialized with appropriate default values.

member.param: Pointer to your DebugEventProc callback function, which GDI+ can call on debug builds for assertions and warnings. The default value is NULL.

Boolean value that specifies whether to suppress the GDI+ background thread. If you pass TRUE, then returns (in its output parameter) a pointer to a hook function, and a pointer to an unhook function. You must call those functions appropriately to replace the background thread. If you don't want to be responsible for calling the hook and unhook functions, then set this member to FALSE. The default value is FALSE.
Boolean value that specifies whether you want GDI+ to suppress external image codecs. GDI+ version 1.0 doesn't support external image codecs, so this parameter is ignored. The default value is FALSE.

member.name: GdiplusStartupInput
member.summary: The GdiplusStartupInput structure holds a block of arguments that are required by the function.

member.name: GdiplusStartupInput.GdiplusVersion
member.summary: Specifies the version of GDI+. Must be 1.

member.name: GdiplusStartupInput.DebugEventCallback
member.summary: Pointer to a callback function that GDI+ can call, on debug builds, for assertions and warnings. The default value is NULL.

member.name: GdiplusStartupInput.SuppressBackgroundThread
member.summary: Boolean value that specifies whether to suppress the GDI+ background thread. If you set this member to TRUE, then returns (in its output parameter) a pointer to a hook function, and a pointer to an unhook function. You must call those functions appropriately to replace the background thread. If you don't want to be responsible for calling the hook and unhook functions, then set this member to FALSE. The default value is FALSE.

member.name: GdiplusStartupInput.SuppressExternalCodecs
member.summary: Boolean value that specifies whether you want GDI+ to suppress external image codecs. GDI+ version 1.0 doesn't support external image codecs, so this field is ignored. The default value is FALSE.
